SELECT count(*) FROM mission WHERE end_d.indexStatement: CREATE INDEX End_date_and_timeMissionHASH ON mission USING HASH(end_date_and_time);
CREATE INDEX End_date_and_timeMissionBTREE ON mission USING BTREE(end_date_and_time);
CREATE INDEX Start_date_and_timeMissionHASH ON mission USING HASH(start_date_and_time);
CREATE INDEX Start_date_and_timeMissionBTREE ON mission USING BTREE(start_date_and_time);
CREATE INDEX End_date_and_timeStart_date_and_timeMissionBTREE ON mission USING BTREE(end_date_and_time, start_date_and_time);
